Dennis's Tennis Lessons

Professional Tennis Instructor

My name is Dennis Afanasev and I've been playing tennis since I was four years old. As a junior tennis player, I trained at the Junior Tennis Champions Center (JTCC) as well as IMG Academy. I won numerous USTA junior tournaments, having been ranked as high as top 30 nationally for boys 14 and under and top 50 nationally for boys 16 and under. In addition, I achieved an International Tennis Federation (ITF) ranking and played numerous professional tournaments. I played division 1 tennis at the George Washington University, and graduated with a degree in Computer Science. I now work as a Computer Engineer at NASA. I'm available for private lessons in the Miami Brickell area. If you're interested, please contact me at (757)-746-7830.
